channel.title: PI error with client
channel.description:
[code]RS2 user client - release #317 java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Class36.methodCustomAnimations(Class36.java:65) at Animation.unpackConfig(Animation.java:1710) at client.startUp(client.java:7830) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:4996) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) NPC.DAT : 1489108188 Called method225 NPC.IDX : 1489126980 Called method225 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 20168 at Stream.method421(Stream.java:194) at Model.readOldModel(Model.java:845) at Model.<init>(Model.java:395) at Model.method462(Model.java:1023) at ItemDef.method201(ItemDef.java:595) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:458) at client.drawInterface(client.java:8692) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2144) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8487) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9235) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4996) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
thats what it says in the run.bat after logging in to the client (no you cant play its black and shows inv place and minimap thing with chat box...

item.title: PI error with client
item.dc:creator: @pokemonn pokemonn
item.description:
